channel.title: Projects on Jean Bilheux
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Jean Bilheux

item.title: Neutron Imaging Official Web Site
item.description: Using HUGO framework, I implemented the Oak Ridge National Laboratory Neutron Imaging Web Site. Why? Being granted beam time at our beam lines can be intimidating as they are many steps that have to be completed before coming to the facility. We used to try to answer those questions by email. This present some issues: * easy to miss some steps * previous users coming to the beamline hesitate in contacting us again * information we send can easily be out of date

item.title: Bragg Edge User Interface (iBeatles)
item.description: Several wavelength-dependent proof-of-concept imaging measurements have been performed at the Spallation Neutron Source (SNS) VULCAN and SNAP beam lines. This effort is focused on prototyping imaging software for the future SNS VENUS imaging beam line. One of the time- of-flight (TOF) techniques that is of interest to the scientific community is the 2-dimensional mapping of phases and average crystalline plane orientation in samples ex-situ, but also during applied stresses such as tensile loading and heating.
